ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I feel out of place in most situations because of my health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: Having this health condition(s) has ruined my life
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: People without my health condition(s) could not possibly understand me
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I am embarrassed or ashamed that I have this health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I am disappointed in myself for having this health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I blame myself for my health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I feel that I am a lesser person compared to others who don't have my health condition(s)

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I think that negative stereotypes (or assumptions) about people with my health condition(s) are true of me
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I don't think that people with my health condition(s) can live a good, rewarding life

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I don't think I can contribute as much to society as other people can because of my health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I don't think I'm appealing as a romantic partner because of my health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: People treat me unfairly because I have this health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: Other people think that I can't achieve much in life because I have this health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: People ignore me because I have this health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: People take me less seriously because I have this health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: Other people don't believe that my health condition(s) really affects me as much as I say

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: Most people would not be interested in getting close to me because I have this health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: If employers knew I had this health condition(s), they would be less likely to hire me

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I don't share much about myself with others because I don't want to burden them with my health condition(s)

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I don't spend much time with other people because I worry what they will think of me due to my health condition(s)

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: Negative assumptions about people with my health condition(s) keep me isolated from the world around me

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I stay away from social situations in order to protect my family or friends from feeling embarrassed by my health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: Being around people who don't have my health condition(s) makes me feel like I don't belong
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I try not to get close to people who don't have my health condition(s) to avoid rejection

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I don't tell other people that I have this health condition(s) because I'm afraid they will judge me

Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I feel comfortable being seen in public with a person who has the same health condition(s) as me
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: In general, I am able to live life the way I want to even with my health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: I can have a good, fulfilling life, despite my health condition(s)
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: People with my health condition(s) make important contributions to society
Please think about your health condition(s) and rate your agreement with the following in the past month: Living with my health condition(s) has made me a strong person
